name: Ayesha Rahman
details: Ayesha is a passionate guide who loves to showcase the rich cultural heritage of Bangladesh. She specializes in Dhaka city tours and is fluent in both Bengali and English.

review.comment: Kabir's boat tour was fantastic. Saw a lot of birds!
Ayesha provided an amazing tour of Dhaka. Highly recommended!
Enjoyed my time with Ayesha. She's very knowledgeable.

name: Rahim Khan
details: Rahim is an experienced guide in the scenic region of Sylhet. He is well-versed in the history and natural beauty of Sylhet, making him the perfect companion for your trip.

review.comment: Rahim's knowledge of Sylhet is impressive. Great tour!
Had a good time exploring Sylhet with Rahim.

name: Farida Islam
details: Farida is your go-to guide for exploring Cox's Bazar, home to the world's longest natural sea beach. She can take you on an unforgettable beach adventure.

review.comment: Farida made my visit to Cox's Bazar incredible!
The beach tour with Farida was a highlight of my trip.

name: Abdul Karim
details: Abdul is a seasoned guide for the Sundarbans mangrove forest. He knows the flora and fauna of this UNESCO World Heritage site like the back of his hand.

review.comment: Abdul's expertise in the Sundarbans is unmatched. Fantastic trip!
Enjoyed the wildlife safari with Abdul. Great guide!

name: Sadia Ahmed
details: Sadia is an expert in guiding travelers through the lush Chittagong Hill Tracts. She is fluent in multiple languages, making her tours accessible to a wide range of tourists.

review.comment: Sadia's knowledge of the Hill Tracts is impressive. Had a great time!
Sadia's tour was informative and enjoyable.

name: Nasir Uddin
details: Nasir specializes in tours of Rangamati, known for its stunning lakes and tribal culture. He can provide insights into the local Marma culture and traditions.

review.comment: Nasir's tour of Rangamati was fantastic. Learned a lot!
Enjoyed the cultural experiences with Nasir.

name: Mithun Ali
details: Mithun is your guide to Srimangal, the 'Tea Capital of Bangladesh.' He can take you on tea estate tours and introduce you to the world of tea production.

review.comment: Mithun's tea estate tour was amazing. Highly recommended!
Learned a lot about tea production with Mithun.

name: Nusrat Khan
details: Nusrat specializes in Kuakata, known for its panoramic sea views and serene ambiance. She can help you experience the tranquil beauty of this coastal gem.

review.comment: Nusrat's tour of Kuakata was breathtaking. Loved it!
Enjoyed the coastal views with Nusrat. Great guide!

name: Tahmina Begum
details: Tahmina is your guide to Rajshahi, famous for its historical sites and mango orchards. She can take you on a cultural and culinary journey in this region.

review.comment: Tahmina's tour was informative and delicious. Great food!
Enjoyed the mango orchard visit with Tahmina.

name: Sajjad Hasan
details: Sajjad is your gateway to the picturesque Barisal region, known for its numerous rivers and waterways. He can organize boat tours and nature excursions.

review.comment: Sajjad's boat tour was relaxing and beautiful. Loved it!
Enjoyed the nature walk with Sajjad. Great experience!

name: Nadia Akhtar
details: Nadia is another expert guide in Cox's Bazar, offering a unique perspective on this coastal paradise. She specializes in eco-friendly and adventure tours.

review.comment: Nadia's eco-tour was amazing. Loved the adventure!
Had a great time exploring Cox's Bazar with Nadia.

name: Imran Hussain
details: Imran is a wildlife enthusiast and guide in the Sundarbans. He can lead you on safaris to spot Bengal tigers and other wildlife in their natural habitat.

review.comment: Imran's wildlife safari was thrilling. Saw Bengal tigers!
Enjoyed the nature experience with Imran. Great guide!

name: Mona Chowdhury
details: Mona specializes in the scenic Bandarban region, famous for its lush green hills and indigenous communities. She can arrange trekking and cultural experiences.

review.comment: Mona's trekking tour was amazing. Beautiful landscapes!
Enjoyed the cultural experiences with Mona.

name: Kabir Rahman
details: Kabir is your guide to Khulna, the gateway to the Sundarbans. He can organize boat tours, bird-watching expeditions, and nature walks in the region.

review.comment: Kabir's boat tour was fantastic. Saw a lot of birds!
Enjoyed the nature walk with Kabir. Great guide!
